job_purpose: Seeking a Data Scientist to work on a contract basis on an exciting new project in Perth, Australia.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Provide expertise on statistical, mathematical, and machine learning concepts
Conduct research, design, and implement cutting-edge algorithms and predictive statistical models
Perform exploratory analysis of datasets to develop and refine preliminary hypotheses
Identify key data features and engineer data pipelines
Provide training and knowledge transfer for analytics products
Develop and deploy data science solutions using best-in-class processes
Foster an innovative and disruptive technology culture
required_qualifications: Tertiary qualifications in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
Strong technical background and coding skills in Python, SQL, and/or R
Experience in implementing data science projects using HR or Social Sciences data
Solid understanding of statistical concepts, machine learning, and algorithms
Experience with data manipulation and analysis libraries
Curiosity and eagerness to learn new concepts and technologies
preferred_qualifications: Experience with cloud computing platforms like AWS and Azure
Experience with Git code management tools
company_details: Brunel is a recruitment and flexible workforce solution provider connecting talented individuals with opportunities in Australasia and globally. They specialize in highly skilled roles across various disciplines and pride themselves on being an equal opportunity employer.
